entries.femaleVariant: You'd think every smart-ass would've encrypted their comms by now. Anyway... what's the message say?
Raffen Shiv bought a virus, and they're broadcasting it around via an aerial transmitter.
Wasn't there an antenna around here?
Mmm-hm. Not for much longer, it won't be.
entries.maleVariant: Uh-huh. Not for much longer, it won't be.

entries.femaleVariant: Man, this transmitter takes me back...
Back in 2020 we used 'em for pirate broadcasts. Y'know, blastin' hardcore punk on badge frequencies and whatnot.
Hm... so this must be how Raffen Shiv hacked those drones...
Better put it out of its misery. Once and for all.
That is, 'til some netbozos hijacked 'em and let loose the demons of cyber-hell 'cross the whole city. Ruined our good, clean fun.
Was beginning to think you'd never figure it out.
